entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
